dc_title_s: A map of North America: with the European settlements & whatever else is remarkable in ye West Indies, from the latest and best observations; R. W. Seale delin. et sculp.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Shows California as an island. Shows locations of European cities and towns, Indian towns, forts and castles. From Paul Rapin de Thóyras "The History of England", continued by N. Tindal. London, 1744. v. 3; see Maps of America p. 571. 1 map; 37 x 46 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Seale, Richard William.,Rapin de Thoyras, M. (Paul), 1661-1725.,Tindal, N. (Nicholas), 1687-1774.
